description.value:
[Addictive] Under the effects of Halluncinogenics for 1d5 hours, when it wears off, depressed for 1d10 hours, unless another is taken

Requirements

Taking more than one dose within 24 hours forces a cumulative -20 Toughness Test. If failing, drug does nothing and further doses also do nothing for next 24 hours.

Effect: Rare

Notes: 285 T
